qcfg.configDir.global.description: Global configuration directory for vscode-qcfg specific features (defaults to HOME directory)

qcfg.configDir.workspace.description: Workspace configuration direcotry for vsdode-qcfg specific features, relative to workspace file's directory or the only folder by default

qcfg.remote.setDefault.description: Per-workspace/folder setting to set it as default remote server

qcfg.langClient.remote.description: C/C++ language clients are remote (over SSH)

qcfg.git.web.description: List of rules to open current line in Git Web UI

items.description: Regexp to match against remote URL

qcfg.configRules.description: Array of configuration rules per file type, filename etc.

glob.description: Glob pattern to match against file name.

qcfg.autoMarkdownPreview.description: Open preview automatically when opening markdown documents

qcfg.newNote.folder.description: Workspace folder name for creating new notes

qcfg.newNote.path.description: Path of notes directory relative to workspace folder root

qcfg.fileDiagnostics.show.description: Whether do show per-file diagnostic counts in statusbar

qcfg.fileDiagnostics.excludeMessage.description: Exclude diagnostics whose message matches this pattern

qcfg.fileDiagnostics.excludeSource.description: Exclude diagnostics whose source matches this pattern

qcfg.fileDiagnostics.excludeCodes.description: Exclude diagnostics whose code matches any of these

scripts.vscode:prepublish: make generate && webpack --mode production && make check
scripts.compile: make generate && webpack --mode none --env DEBUG && make check
